description:
A cursed doll from Ageha`s past comes to haunt Renge. Later, Rinne helps a spirit by setting her up on a date with Matsugo, despite Matsugo`s lingering affections for Rinne!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nanoka Dattara Akeru Koto / Gin`iro no Kama / Shinigami Ouji
Open After Seven Days / Silver Scythe / Prince of the Shinigami
À ouvrir dans sept jours – La faux argentée – Le prince Shinigami
七日たったら開けること / 銀色のカマ / 死神王子
